## HighPrecisionPointMaterialParameters interface

Parameters used when constructing a new \[\[HighPrecisionPointMaterial\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface HighPrecisionPointMaterialParameters extends THREE.PointsMaterialParameters 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [color](./harp-materials.highprecisionpointmaterialparameters.color.md) | number \| string \| THREE.Color | Point color. |
|  [opacity](./harp-materials.highprecisionpointmaterialparameters.opacity.md) | number | Point opacity. |
|  [scale](./harp-materials.highprecisionpointmaterialparameters.scale.md) | number | Point scale. |
|  [uvTransform](./harp-materials.highprecisionpointmaterialparameters.uvtransform.md) | THREE.Matrix3 | UV transformation matrix. |
